mapper.update: update pay_channel_standard_rates set pay_channel_id = #{payChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, standard_rate = #{standardRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, trade_standard_rate_id = #{tradeStandardRateId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, pay_channel_id, standard_rate, description, created_at, updated_at, trade_standard_rate_id from pay_channel_standard_rates

select pcsr.*, dtsr.id dtsr_id, dtsr.merchant_type_name dtsr_merchant_type_name from pay_channel_standard_rates pcsr inner join dictionary_trade_standard_rates dtsr on pcsr.trade_standard_rate_id=dtsr.id where pay_channel_id=#{param1}
